author: Katherine Bindley
title: Talenti Gelato Is Delicious—If You Can Unscrew the Lid
text:
Rhiannon Brown was grocery shopping at Supremo Food Market in Philadelphia in December when she spotted a pint of Talenti Roman Raspberry sorbetto. She was recovering from a cold and couldn’t wait to eat it—couldn’t stop thinking about how good it would make her scratchy throat feel.
When she arrived home around lunch time, she couldn’t unscrew the plastic lid. She tried oven mitts with grips. She tried running the jar under hot water. She tried gripping the thing so hard she bruised the palm of her hand. Ms. Brown, 24 years...
